@usedefaults

{{html:
    <div ng-app="eveTestApp">
}}

{{evegrid:
    schema.url='/proxy/eve/system'
    spec.json.path=/docs/spec.json
    entity.name=eco
    datetime.fields=epoch
    sortBy =
        epoch: -1,
        pid:1,

    column.1 = 
        data:epoch,
        header:Time Stamp,
        format:<a href="/grid/Error Condition?id={guid}">{epoch}</a>,

    column.2 = 
        data:errormessage,
        header:Error Message,

    column.3 =
        data:level,
        header:Level,

    column.4 =
        data:appname,
        header:App name,

    column.5 =
        data:nid,
        header:Node ID,

    column.6 = 
        data:gid,
        header:GID,

    column.7 =
        data:masterjid,
        header:Master JID,
}}

{{html:
    </div>
    <script>
    var eveTestApp = angular.module('eveTestApp', ['eveModule']);
    eveTestApp.config(['$interpolateProvider', function($interpolateProvider) {
        $interpolateProvider.startSymbol('{[').endSymbol(']}');
    }]);
    </script>
}}
